revised_title: Invention of Making Optic Glasses and Improving Telescopes
tldr: The article discusses the progress made in grinding optical glasses and improving telescopes. It mentions Hevelius's invention of a method to create optical glasses of any conic section and his plans to present it to the Royal Society. Hugens expresses hope for his own attempts to improve optics, and du Son is working on perfecting telescopes using parabolic figures.
